item.title: Normal Equation for Linear Regression Tutorial
item.description: Learn what the normal equation is and how can you use it to build machine learning models.

item.title: How to Execute SQL Queries in Python and R Tutorial
item.description: Learn easy and effective ways to run SQL queries in Python and R for data analysis and database management.

item.title: Data Visualization with Bokeh Tutorial: Plotting Data Structures
item.description: Learn basic visualizations of various data structures using Bokeh.

item.description: Learn about the lasso and ridge techniques of regression. Compare and analyse the methods in detail.

item.description: Learn the important basics and installation process of Bokeh

item.title: Gradient Descent Tutorial
item.description: Learn how gradient descent works and how to implement it.
item.dc:creator: DataCamp Team

item.title: Recurrent Neural Network Tutorial (RNN)
item.description: Learn about the most popular deep learning model RNN and get hands-on experience by building a MasterCard stock price predictor.
item.dc:creator: Abid Ali Awan

item.title: Machine Learning, Pipelines, Deployment and MLOps Tutorial
item.description: Learn basic MLOps and end-to-end development and deployment of ML pipelines.

item.title: Learning Curves Tutorial: What Are Learning Curves?
item.description: Learn about how learning curves can help you evaluate your data and identify optimal solutions.

item.title: Kaggle Competition Tutorial: Machine Learning from the Titanic
item.description: Prepare for your first Kaggle Competition with this step-by-step tutorial.

item.title: Cloudera Hadoop Tutorial
item.description: Learn about Hadoop ecosystem, the architectures and how to start with Cloudera.

item.title: Kaggle Datasets Tutorial: Kaggle Notebooks
item.description: Learn about Kaggle datasets and notebooks and get a head start on creating your Kaggle profile.

item.title: Python Details on Correlation Tutorial
item.description: A tutorial to understand what correlation is and why it is important for every aspiring data scientist to know it.

item.title: Time Series Forecasting Tutorial
item.description: A detailed guide to time series forecasting. Learn to use python and supporting frameworks. Learn about the statistical modelling involved.

item.title: Deep Learning - A Tutorial for Data Scientists
item.description: The tutorial answers the most frequently asked questions about deep learning and explores various aspects of deep learning with real-life examples.

item.title: Mastering PyCharm Tutorial
item.description: The data scientist's comprehensive guide to mastering PyCharm

item.title: Data Analyst Skills for Career Success
item.description: Explore data analysis as a career and how to up-skill for the role.
item.dc:creator: DataCamp Team

item.title: Data Cleaning Tutorial
item.description: Data cleaning is a very basic building block of data science. Learn the importance of data cleaning and how to use python and carry out the process.

item.title: How to Become a Data Scientist
item.description: Find out if data science is for you, what courses to start with, how to build a portfolio and become a data scientist.
item.dc:creator: Jose Jorge Rodriguez Salgado

item.title: How Data & Culture Unlock Digital Transformation
item.description: Chief Data & Innovation Officer at Gulf Bank, Mai AlOwaish, outlines how a people and data-first approach can unlock the value of digital transformation for organizations across industries.

item.title: Google Colab Tutorial for Data Scientists
item.description: A brief guide for navigating Google Colab to carry out data science coding and collaborating with other data scientists.

item.description: Considering a new career in data science? This guide will prepare you for the journey.

item.title: What is Data Engineering?
item.description: Learn what data engineering is, what is the difference between data science and data engineering, the scope in the field, and how to become one.
